scripts.start:server: docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker-compose build && docker-compose up
scripts.dev: concurrently "docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker-compose build && docker-compose up" "yarn workspace @draftbash/web-client dev"
scripts.build:server: npm run build -w packages/server && npx tsc
scripts.show:database: docker exec -it draftbash-postgres-1 psql -U postgres -d draftbash
